name: Virtual Reality Hidden Objects: the shopping list
name_original: Virtual Reality Hidden Objects: the shopping list
description:
- Look around with your phone to find the hidden objects. Move around the supermarket and look at the shelves for the items in your trolley to shop them.

- Optional single screen mode available to play without V.R glasses. Touch the screen to switch between single and double screen modes. Play a 360 degrees experience in your phone now!.
Compatible with virtual reality glasses.

- The game control is “looking at things”, no buttons or external controls. Natural V.R experience.

- Easy to play and accessible virtual reality experience. No text, no instructions, no buttons. Just go ahead shopping staring at the items.

- Look around to find the hidden objects. Move around the supermarket and look at the shelves for the items in your trolley to shop them.

- Search all the hidden objects of your shopping list in time. Be fast to achieve 3 stars! .
Unlock new levels with bigger shopping lists and aisles full of items.

- 3D sound, steoroscopic view.

- This game is a perfect fit for virtual reality : explore the shelves, move around 360º, and search the hidden objects.
